meaning: to expound; to elaborate on; to set forth
example_zh: 请阐述你的观点。
example_py: Qǐng chǎnshù nǐ de guāndiǎn.
example_en: Please elaborate on your viewpoint.

chars.m: to state, to narrate, to express

meaning: to differentiate; to distinguish
example_zh: 要善于辨别真假信息。
example_py: Yào shànyú biànbié zhēnjiǎ xìnxī.
example_en: One should be good at distinguishing true from false information.

meaning: to overlook; to look down at; bird's eye view
example_zh: 从山顶可以俯瞰整个城市。
example_py: Cóng shāndǐng kěyǐ fǔkàn zhěnggè chéngshì.
example_en: From the mountaintop, you can overlook the entire city.

chars.m: to bow down, to look down
to look down from above, to overlook

meaning: to interpret; to explain; interpretation
example_zh: 她对这首诗做出了独特的诠释。
example_py: Tā duì zhè shǒu shī zuòchū le dútè de quánshì.
example_en: She gave a unique interpretation of this poem.

chars.m: to release, to explain, to clarify

meaning: to condense; to gather; to concentrate
example_zh: 这首歌凝聚了许多情感。
example_py: Zhè shǒu gē níngjù le xǔduō qínggǎn.
example_en: This song concentrates a lot of emotions.

chars.m: to congeal, to concentrate, to stare
to gather, to assemble, to collect

meaning: to permeate; to infiltrate; to seep through
example_zh: 文化已经渗透到日常生活的各个方面。
example_py: Wénhuà yǐjīng shèntòu dào rìcháng shēnghuó de gègè fāngmiàn.
example_en: Culture has permeated every aspect of daily life.

chars.m: to seep, to infiltrate, to exude

meaning: to contain; to embody; to imply
example_zh: 这句话蕴含着深刻的道理。
example_py: Zhè jù huà yùnhán zhe shēnkè de dàolǐ.
example_en: This sentence embodies a profound truth.

chars.m: to contain, to include, to hold in mouth

meaning: to consider carefully; to weigh; to deliberate
example_zh: 这个决定需要仔细斟酌。
example_py: Zhège juédìng xūyào zǐxì zhēnzhuó.
example_en: This decision needs careful deliberation.

chars.m: to pour wine, to consider carefully

meaning: to forge; to create; to accomplish
example_zh: 坚持不懈铸就了他的成功。
example_py: Jiānchí bùxiè zhùjiù le tā de chénggōng.
example_en: Perseverance forged his success.

chars.m: to cast metal, to forge, to mold

meaning: to blend; to merge; integration
example_zh: 东西方文化的融合是一种趋势。
example_py: Dōngxī fāng wénhuà de rónghé shì yī zhǒng qūshì.
example_en: The integration of Eastern and Western cultures is a trend.

meaning: to consolidate; to strengthen; to solidify
example_zh: 我们要巩固已取得的成果。
example_py: Wǒmen yào gǒnggù yǐ qǔdé de chéngguǒ.
example_en: We must consolidate the achievements already made.

meaning: to deduce; to perform; deduction
example_zh: 她用音乐演绎了一段动人的故事。
example_py: Tā yòng yīnyuè yǎnyì le yī duàn dòng rén de gùshi.
example_en: She performed a touching story through music.

chars.m: to perform, to evolve, to develop

meaning: to precipitate; to settle; sediment; accumulation
example_zh: 岁月的沉淀让人更加成熟。
example_py: Suìyuè de chéndiàn ràng rén gèngjiā chéngshú.
example_en: The accumulation of years makes people more mature.

meaning: to mediate; to broker; to intercede
example_zh: 他在双方之间进行了斡旋。
example_py: Tā zài shuāngfāng zhījiān jìnxíng le wòxuán.
example_en: He mediated between both parties.

chars.m: to rotate, to circle, to return

meaning: vicissitudes of life; change over time
example_zh: 历经沧桑的老人讲述了许多故事。
example_py: Lìjīng cāngsāng de lǎorén jiǎngshù le xǔduō gùshi.
example_en: The elderly person who had experienced many vicissitudes told many stories.

meaning: to scrupulously abide by; to strictly observe
example_zh: 我们应恪守职业道德。
example_py: Wǒmen yīng kèshǒu zhíyè dàodé.
example_en: We should scrupulously abide by professional ethics.

chars.m: to be respectful, to be careful
to guard, to keep, to observe

meaning: to cover; to encompass; to include
example_zh: 这本书涵盖了很多重要话题。
example_py: Zhè běn shū hángài le hěn duō zhòngyào huàtí.
example_en: This book covers many important topics.

meaning: to trace back to the origin; etymology
example_zh: 让我们溯源这个词的历史。
example_py: Ràng wǒmen sùyuán zhège cí de lìshǐ.
example_en: Let us trace back the history of this word.

chars.m: to go upstream, to trace back

meaning: dialectical; to argue from evidence
example_zh: 要用辩证的方法看问题。
example_py: Yào yòng biànzhèng de fāngfǎ kàn wèntí.
example_en: One should use a dialectical method to view problems.

meaning: to edify; to influence gradually; to nurture
example_zh: 他从小受到音乐的熏陶。
example_py: Tā cóng xiǎo shòudào yīnyuè de xūntáo.
example_en: He was nurtured by music since childhood.

chars.m: to smoke, to fumigate, to influence

meaning: to fit; to match; to be in sync
example_zh: 他的想法与我们的目标契合。
example_py: Tā de xiǎngfǎ yǔ wǒmen de mùbiāo qìhé.
example_en: His ideas fit with our goals.

meaning: game theory; strategic interaction; to compete
example_zh: 国际贸易中的博弈决定了市场的格局。
example_py: Guójì màoyì zhōng de báyì juédìng le shìchǎng de géjú.
example_en: Strategic interactions in international trade determine market structure.

meaning: to clarify; to elucidate; to explain clearly
example_zh: 报告详细地阐明了改革的必要性。
example_py: Bàogào xiángxì de chǎnmíng le gǎigé de bìyàoxìng.
example_en: The report clearly explained the necessity of reform.

meaning: to transcend; to surpass; to exceed; transcendence
example_zh: 我们要不断超越自己，追求卓越。
example_py: Wǒmen yào búduàn chāoyuè zìjǐ, zhuīqiú zhuóyuè.
example_en: We must continuously transcend ourselves and pursue excellence.

meaning: to inherit; to pass on; inheritance; legacy
example_zh: 中华文明的传承需要每一代人的努力。
example_py: Zhōnghuá wénmíng de chuánchéng xūyào měi yī dài rén de nǔlì.
example_en: The inheritance of Chinese civilization requires the effort of every generation.

meaning: pioneering feat; groundbreaking move; innovation
example_zh: 这个项目是中国历史上的一个伟大创举。
example_py: Zhège xiàngmù shì Zhōngguó lìshǐ shang de yīge wěidà chuàngjǔ.
example_en: This project is a great pioneering feat in Chinese history.

meaning: complex; intricate; tangled
example_zh: 国际形势错综复杂，充满了挑战。
example_py: Guójì xíngshì cuòzōng fùzá, chōngmǎn le tiǎozhàn.
example_en: International situation is complex and full of challenges.

meaning: to break; to shatter; to overthrow
example_zh: 科技创新打破了传统产业的格局。
example_py: Kējì chuàngxīn dǎpò le chuántǒng chǎnyè de géjú.
example_en: Technological innovation shattered the traditional industry landscape.

meaning: unique; distinctive; original insight
example_zh: 他对问题有独到的见解。
example_py: Tā duì wèntí yǒu dúdào de jiànjiě.
example_en: He has unique insights into the problem.

meaning: to be thought-provoking; to make one reflect deeply
example_zh: 这部纪录片的内容发人深省，令人思考。
example_py: Zhè bù jìlùpiàn de nèiróng fā rén shēn shěng, lìngrén sīkǎo.
example_en: The content of this documentary is thought-provoking and causes reflection.

meaning: category; scope; domain; field
example_zh: 这个问题超出了我们的研究范畴。
example_py: Zhège wèntí chāochū le wǒmen de yánjiū fànchóu.
example_en: This issue goes beyond the scope of our research.

meaning: disagreement; divergence; difference
example_zh: 两国在贸易问题上存在分歧。
example_py: Liǎng guó zài màoyì wèntí shang cunzài fēnqī.
example_en: The two countries have disagreements on trade issues.

meaning: to forge ahead; to strive forward; to advance
example_zh: 我们要奋进新时代，开创美好未来。
example_py: Wǒmen yào fèngjìn xīn shídài, kāichuàng měihǎo wèilái.
example_en: We must forge ahead in the new era and create a better future.

meaning: to bestow; to endow; to give
example_zh: 教育赋予人类获取知识的能力。
example_py: Jiàoyù fùyǔ rénlèi huòqǔ zhīshi de néinglì.
example_en: Education endows humanity with the ability to acquire knowledge.

meaning: to inspire; to move; inspiration; call
example_zh: 伟大的理想感召着千千万万的人民。
example_py: Wěidà de lǐxiǎng gǎnzhào zhe qiānqiānwànwan de rénmín.
example_en: Great ideals inspire millions of people.

meaning: from a commanding height; with a broad perspective
example_zh: 领导要从高屋建瓴的角度看待问题。
example_py: Lǐngdǎo yào cóng gāo wū jiàn líng de jiǎodù kàndài wèntí.
example_en: Leaders should view issues from a commanding perspective.

meaning: to innovate; reform; innovation
example_zh: 企业需要不断革新来适应市场变化。
example_py: Qǐyè xūyào búduàn géxīn lái shìyìng shìchǎng biànhuà.
example_en: Enterprises must continuously innovate to adapt to market changes.

meaning: to carry out; to implement thoroughly; to fulfill
example_zh: 要贯彻执行党的方针政策。
example_py: Yào guànchè zhíxíng dǎng de fāngzhēn zhèngcè.
example_en: One must thoroughly implement the party's policies.

meaning: to connect; to integrate; to understand thoroughly
example_zh: 要贯通古今中外的思想资源。
example_py: Yào guàntōng gǔjīn zhōngwài de sīxiǎng zīyuán.
example_en: One should integrate intellectual resources from throughout time and the world.

meaning: final destination; ultimate end; resting place
example_zh: 坚持中国特色社会主义是我们的历史归宿。
example_py: Jiānchí Zhōngguó tèsè shèhuìzhǔyì shì wǒmen de lìshǐ guīsu.
example_en: Persisting in Chinese socialism with characteristics is our historical destiny.

meaning: implicit; restrained; suggestive; subtle
example_zh: 这部作品的表达方式很含蓄，需要深入理解。
example_py: Zhè bù zuòpǐn de biǎodá fāngshì hěn hányù, xūyào shēnrù lǐjiě.
example_en: This work's expression is subtle and requires deep understanding.

meaning: bugle; clarion; call to action
example_zh: 我们吹响了新时代的号角。
example_py: Wǒmen chuīxiǎng le xīn shídài de háojiǎo.
example_en: We sounded the bugle call of the new era.

meaning: wide gap; chasm; wide gulf
example_zh: 贫富之间的鸿沟不断扩大。
example_py: Píngù zhījiān de hóngōu búduàn kuòdà.
example_en: The gap between rich and poor continues to widen.

meaning: to resolve; to ease; to dissolve
example_zh: 双方通过协商成功化解了矛盾。
example_py: Shuāngfāng tōngguò xiéshang chénggōng huàjiě le máodùn.
example_en: The two parties successfully resolved the conflict through negotiation.

meaning: to radiate; to display; to show vitality
example_zh: 改革开放使中国焕发了新的生机。
example_py: Gǎigé kāifàng shǐ Zhōngguó huànfā le xīn de shēngjī.
example_en: Reform and opening up gave China new vitality.

meaning: to gather; to converge; to assemble
example_zh: 各种文化在这个城市汇聚。
example_py: Gèzhǒng wénhuà zài zhège chéngshì huìjù.
example_en: Various cultures converge in this city.

meaning: to surge; to swell; to stir
example_zh: 思想的激荡推动了社会的进步。
example_py: Sīxiǎng de jīdàng tuīdòng le shèhuì de jìnbù.
example_en: The surge of thought drove social progress.

meaning: accumulation; sedimentation; buildup
example_zh: 深厚的文化积淀是我们的财富。
example_py: Shēnhòu de wénhuà jīdiàn shì wǒmen de cáifù.
example_en: Deep cultural accumulation is our wealth.

meaning: to inherit; to succeed; inheritance
example_zh: 我们要继承前人的优秀成果。
example_py: Wǒmen yào jìchéng qiánrén de yōuxiù chéngguǒ.
example_en: We must inherit the excellent achievements of our predecessors.

meaning: to give consideration to both; to balance; to attend to
example_zh: 发展要兼顾经济和生态的协调。
example_py: Fāzhǎn yào jiānggù jīngjì hé shēngtài de xiétiáo.
example_en: Development must balance economic and ecological coordination.

meaning: to discriminate; to distinguish; to identify
example_zh: 要提高群众鉴别真假信息的能力。
example_py: Yào tígāo qúnzhòng jiànbié zhēnjiǎ xìnxī de néinglì.
example_en: We must improve the public's ability to distinguish true from false information.

meaning: to integrate; to blend; to merge
example_zh: 东西方文化的交融产生了新的艺术形式。
example_py: Dōngxīfāng wénhuà de jiāoróng chǎnshēng le xīn de yìshù xíngshì.
example_en: The integration of Eastern and Western cultures created new art forms.

meaning: to learn from; to draw lessons from; reference
example_zh: 我们要借鉴国外先进的经验。
example_py: Wǒmen yào jièjiàn guówài xiānjìn de jīngyàn.
example_en: We should learn from advanced international experience.

meaning: essence; core; quintessence
example_zh: 传统文化的精髓需要代代相传。
example_py: Chuántǒng wénhuà de jīngsuǐ xūyào dàidài xiāngchuán.
example_en: The essence of traditional culture must be passed down through generations.

meaning: to perceive; to see through; keen insight
example_zh: 领导者要有洞察时代发展的眼光。
example_py: Lǐngdǎozhě yào yǒu dòngchá shídài fāzhǎn de yǎnguāng.
example_en: Leaders must have keen insight into the development of the times.

meaning: realm; sphere; level of achievement
example_zh: 艺术创作要追求更高的境界。
example_py: Yìshù chuàngzuò yào zhuīqiú gèng gāo de jìngjiè.
example_en: Artistic creation should pursue a higher realm.

meaning: to pioneer; to explore; to expand; opening
example_zh: 我们要开拓新的市场和领域。
example_py: Wǒmen yào kāituò xīn de shìchǎng hé lǐngyù.
example_en: We must explore new markets and fields.

meaning: engraved in one's heart; unforgettable; deeply remembered
example_zh: 这次经历给我留下了刻骨铭心的印象。
example_py: Zhè cì jīnglì gěi wǒ liúxia le kègǔ míngxīn de yìnxiàng.
example_en: This experience left an unforgettable impression on me.

meaning: tolerant; magnanimous; to tolerate; tolerance
example_zh: 一个成熟的社会需要宽容的精神。
example_py: Yīge chéngshú de shèhuì xūyào kuānróng de jīngshén.
example_en: A mature society needs a spirit of tolerance.

meaning: to be scarce; deficiency; shortage
example_zh: 发展中国家面临资本匮乏的挑战。
example_py: Fāzhǎnzhōng guójiā miànlín zīběn kuìfá de tiǎozhàn.
example_en: Developing countries face challenges of capital shortage.

meaning: concept; idea; ideology; philosophy
example_zh: 可持续发展是现代社会的核心理念。
example_py: Kě chíxù fāzhǎn shì xiàndài shèhuì de héxīn lǐniàn.
example_en: Sustainable development is the core concept of modern society.

meaning: to become ever fresher with age; timeless; enduring charm
example_zh: 经典之作往往历久弥新，代代相传。
example_py: Jīngdiǎn zhī zuò wǎngwǎng lìjiǔ míxīn, dàidài xiāngchuán.
example_en: Classic works often become fresher with age and are passed down through generations.

meaning: advantages and disadvantages; pros and cons
example_zh: 要全面分析这个政策的利弊。
example_py: Yào quánmiàn fēnxī zhège zhèngcè de lìbì.
example_en: One should analyze the pros and cons of this policy comprehensively.

meaning: to temper; to refine; to hone
example_zh: 在实践中磨砺意志，增强能力。
example_py: Zài shíjiàn zhōng móli yìzhì, zēngqiáng néinglì.
example_en: Temper one's will in practice and strengthen abilities.

meaning: concise; refined; polished
example_zh: 语言要凝练有力，表达要准确。
example_py: Yǔyán yào níngliàn yǒulì, biǎodá yào zhǔnquè.
example_en: Language should be concise and powerful, expression should be accurate.

meaning: character; integrity; moral quality
example_zh: 品格是一个人最重要的财富。
example_py: Pǐngé shì yīge rén zuì zhòngyào de cáifù.
example_en: Character is a person's most valuable asset.

meaning: balance; to balance; equilibrium
example_zh: 企业发展要在速度和质量之间找到平衡。
example_py: Qǐyè fāzhǎn yào zài sùdù hé zhìliàng zhījiān zhǎodào pínghuà.
example_en: Enterprise development must find balance between speed and quality.

meaning: revelation; enlightenment; to illuminate
example_zh: 这个成功案例给我们很多启示。
example_py: Zhège chénggōng àn lì gěi wǒmen hěn duō qǐshì.
example_en: This success case provides us many insights.

meaning: forward-looking; visionary; to look ahead
example_zh: 我们要有前瞻的眼光规划未来。
example_py: Wǒmen yào yǒu qiánzhān de yǎnguāng guīhuà wèilái.
example_en: We must have forward-looking vision to plan for the future.

meaning: potential; hidden capacity; latent power
example_zh: 年轻一代蕴含着巨大的潜力。
example_py: Niánqīng yī dài yùnhán zhe jùdà de qiánlì.
example_en: The younger generation has enormous potential.

meaning: tough; resilient; strong yet flexible
example_zh: 中华民族有强韧的生命力和适应力。
example_py: Zhōnghuá mínzú yǒu qiáng ruìn de shēngmìnglì hé shìyìnglì.
example_en: The Chinese nation has strong resilience and adaptability.

meaning: sentiment; feeling; emotion; nostalgia
example_zh: 艺术作品要传达深层的情怀。
example_py: Yìshù zuòpǐn yào chuándá shēncéng de qínghuái.
example_en: Artistic works should convey deep emotion.

meaning: to seek; to search; to pursue
example_zh: 人生就是一个不断求索的过程。
example_py: Rénshēng jiùshì yīge búduàn qiúsuǒ de guòchéng.
example_en: Life is a process of continuous seeking.

meaning: warmth; enthusiasm; earnestness
example_zh: 我们以热忱的态度为人民服务。
example_py: Wǒmen yǐ règhěn de tàidu wèi rénmín fúwù.
example_en: We serve the people with warm enthusiasm.

meaning: humanities; human culture; liberal arts
example_zh: 人文精神对社会发展至关重要。
example_py: Rénwén jīngshén duì shèhuì fāzhǎn zhìguānzhòngyào.
example_en: The humanistic spirit is crucial to social development.

meaning: to be sharp and enterprising; to be vigorously progressive
example_zh: 要锐意进取，不能固步自封。
example_py: Yào ruìyì jìnqǔ, búnéng gùbu zìfēng.
example_en: One must be vigorously progressive and not stagnate.

meaning: to be good at; to be skilled in
example_zh: 成功的人往往善于学习和创新。
example_py: Chénggōng de rén wǎngwǎng shànyú xuéxí hé chuàngxīn.
example_en: Successful people are often skilled at learning and innovation.

meaning: to thrive continuously; to prosper eternally
example_zh: 中华文明生生不息，延续至今。
example_py: Zhōnghuá wénmíng shēng shēng búxí, yánxù zhì jīn.
example_en: Chinese civilization has thrived continuously and persists to the present day.

meaning: profound; deep; abstruse
example_zh: 哲学思想往往深邃而复杂。
example_py: Zhéxué sīxiǎng wǎngwǎng shēnsuì ér fùzá.
example_en: Philosophical thought is often profound and complex.

meaning: to organize; to sort out; to arrange
example_zh: 要梳理历史脉络，理解发展规律。
example_py: Yào shūlǐ lìshǐ màiluò, lǐjiě fāzhǎn guīlǜ.
example_en: One should organize historical threads and understand development laws.

meaning: logical thinking; dialectical reasoning; to debate intellectually
example_zh: 要学会思辨，不能盲目跟风。
example_py: Yào xuéhuì sībiàn, búnéng máng mù gēnfēng.
example_en: One must learn dialectical thinking and not blindly follow trends.

meaning: to investigate; to probe; to delve into
example_zh: 科学家们深入探究了这个现象的原因。
example_py: Kēxuéjiāmen shēnrù tànjiū le zhège xiànxiàng de yuányīn.
example_en: Scientists deeply investigated the cause of this phenomenon.

meaning: to realize through experience; to grasp intuitively; to comprehend
example_zh: 通过实践，我们才能体悟道理的深意。
example_py: Tōngguò shíjiàn, wǒmen cáinéng tǐwù dàolǐ de shēnyì.
example_en: Through practice, we can truly grasp the deeper meaning of principle.

meaning: to reconcile; to harmonize; harmony
example_zh: 要调和各方的利益关系。
example_py: Yào tiáohé gèfāng de lìyì guānxi.
example_en: One must reconcile the interests of all parties.

meaning: to plan as a whole; to coordinate comprehensively
example_zh: 要统筹兼顾长期和短期的目标。
example_py: Yào tǒngchóu jiānggù chángqī hé duǎnqī de mùbiāo.
example_en: One must comprehensively coordinate long-term and short-term goals.

meaning: to expand; to broaden; expansion
example_zh: 我们要拓展国际合作的范围。
example_py: Wǒmen yào tuòzhǎn guójì hézuò de fànwéi.
example_en: We must broaden the scope of international cooperation.

meaning: complete; comprehensive; well-developed
example_zh: 法律体系要完备，确保有法可依。
example_py: Fǎlǜ tǐxì yào wánbèi, quèbǎo yǒufa kěyī.
example_en: The legal system must be comprehensive to ensure laws to follow.

meaning: all things are renewed; a fresh beginning; renewal of all things
example_zh: 春天到来，大自然万象更新。
example_py: Chūntiān dàolái, dà zìránjiè wànxiàng gēngxīn.
example_en: With spring's arrival, all of nature is renewed.

meaning: cultural heritage; cultural lineage; thread of culture
example_zh: 要保护和传承中华文脉。
example_py: Yào bǎohù hé chuánchéng Zhōnghuá wènmài.
example_en: We must protect and pass down Chinese cultural heritage.

meaning: watertight; impeccable; invulnerable; leaving no room for attack
example_zh: 论证要严密，做到无懈可击。
example_py: Lùnzhèng yào yánmì, zuòdào wú xiè kějī.
example_en: Arguments must be rigorous and impeccable.

meaning: insight; perception; intuitive understanding
example_zh: 学习需要有一定的悟性。
example_py: Xuéxí xūyào yǒu yīdìng de wùxìng.
example_en: Learning requires a certain level of insight.

meaning: to complement each other; to promote one another
example_zh: 理论和实践相辅相成，缺一不可。
example_py: Lǐlùn hé shíjiàn xiāng fǔ xiāng chéng, quē yī búkě.
example_en: Theory and practice complement each other and are both essential.

meaning: novel; original; fresh; innovative
example_zh: 设计要新颖，能吸引消费者的注意。
example_py: Shèjì yào xīnyǐng, néng xīyǐn xiāofèizhě de zhùyìlì.
example_en: Design should be novel and attract consumer attention.

meaning: to trace origins; to go back to roots
example_zh: 我们要寻根溯源，理解文化的起源。
example_py: Wǒmen yào xúnhēn sùyuán, lǐjiě wénhuà de qǐyuán.
example_en: We must trace our cultural roots to understand their origins.

meaning: elegant; refined; tasteful; sophisticated
example_zh: 这个设计很雅致，符合现代审美。
example_py: Zhège shèjì hěn yǎzhì, fúhé xiàndài shěnměi.
example_en: This design is elegant and meets modern aesthetic standards.

meaning: to emerge in response to circumstances; to come into being opportunely
example_zh: 互联网技术应运而生，改变了世界。
example_py: Hùliánwǎng jìshù yìngyùn ér shēng, gǎibiàn le shìjiè.
example_en: Internet technology emerged in response to circumstances and changed the world.

meaning: to plan; to manage; strategic planning
example_zh: 领导者要懂得运筹帷幄。
example_py: Lǐngdǎozhě yào dǒngde yùnchóu wéiwò.
example_en: Leaders must master strategic planning.

meaning: to integrate; to combine; integration
example_zh: 要整合各种资源实现高效发展。
example_py: Yào zhěnghé gèzhǒng zīyuán shíxiàn gāoxiào fāzhǎn.
example_en: One must integrate various resources to achieve efficient development.

meaning: crucial; vital; extremely important
example_zh: 教育对国家发展至关重要。
example_py: Jiàoyù duì guójiā fāzhǎn zhì guān zhòngyào.
example_en: Education is crucial to national development.

meaning: ambition; aspiration; goal in life
example_zh: 他的志向是为社会作出贡献。
example_py: Tā de zhìxiàng shì wèi shèhuì zuòchū gòngxiàn.
example_en: His aspiration is to make contributions to society.

meaning: to lend support; to contribute; to facilitate
example_zh: 科技创新对产业升级起到了重要的助力。
example_py: Kējì chuàngxīn duì chǎnyè shēngjí qǐdào le zhòngyào de zhùlì.
example_en: Technological innovation provided important support for industrial upgrade.

meaning: to strive to improve oneself; self-strengthening; self-reliance
example_zh: 民族的复兴需要自强自立的精神。
example_py: Mínzú de fùxīng xūyào zìqiáng zìlì de jīngshén.
example_en: National rejuvenation requires the spirit of self-strengthening and independence.

meaning: to view as a whole; to take a comprehensive view; comprehensively
example_zh: 综观人类发展的历史，我们可以发现规律。
example_py: Zōngguān rénlèi fāzhǎn de lìshǐ, wǒmen kěyǐ fāxiàn guīlǜ.
example_en: Looking at the history of human development comprehensively, we can discover patterns.

meaning: outstanding; excellent; superiority
example_zh: 追求卓越是优秀企业的特点。
example_py: Zhuīqiú zhuóyuè shì yōuxiù qǐyè de tèdiǎn.
example_en: Pursuing excellence is a characteristic of outstanding enterprises.
